00049       bool Window::MessageHandler( UINT iMessage, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
00050       {
00051             switch( iMessage )
00052             {
00053                   case WM_CLOSE:
00054                         PostQuitMessage( 0 );
00055                         return true;
00056                   default:
00057                         break;
00058             }
00059 
00060             return false;
00061       };
00062 
00063       bool Window::Poll( )
00064       {
00065             MSG msg;
00066             if( PeekMessage( &msg, NULL, 0, 0, PM_REMOVE ) )
00067             {
00068                   if( msg.message == WM_QUIT )
00069                   {
00070                         return false;
00071                   }
00072                   else
00073                   {
00074                         TranslateMessage( &msg );
00075                         DispatchMessage( &msg );
00076                   }
00077             }
00078             return true;
00079       };

00086       LRESULT CALLBACK Window::WndProc( HWND hWindow, UINT iMessage, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
00087       {
00088             bool bProcessed = false;
00089 
00090             if( iMessage == WM_NCCREATE )
00091             {
00092                   SetWindowLong( hWindow, GWL_USERDATA, (int)((LPCREATESTRUCT(lParam))->lpCreateParams) );
00093             }
00094 
00095             Window* mywindow = (Window*)GetWindowLong( hWindow, GWL_USERDATA );
00096             if( mywindow != 0 )
00097                   bProcessed = mywindow->MessageHandler( iMessage, wParam, lParam );
00098 
00099             if( !bProcessed )
00100             {
00101                   return DefWindowProc( hWindow, iMessage, wParam, lParam );
00102             }
00103 
00104             return 0;
00105       };
